issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5.Description

This is *is not a regression*

When a tab is added to a tabgroup, the icon for the current tab is no longer highlighted as the active tab in the bar at the bottom of the screen. 

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Add the attached app.js to an existing project and build to a device
2. Tap 'Click me'

h5.Actual Result

The current tab will no longer be shown as the active tab in the bottom of the screen

h5.Expected Result

The current tab should be shown as the active tab in the bottom of the screen
fields.summary: iOS: When adding a tab the active tab icon does not stay highlighted
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.1
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.1.201410281743
Titanium SDK build: 3.5.0.v20141217134117
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.1
Alloy: 1.5.1
Xcode 6.1.1
iPhone 6 Plus (8.1)
